column5: Yesterday after getting some painting in the house done I took off for the afternoon with my son and father in law for bass opener.  My 4 year old son has been out fishing before, but never really into the buggy depths of hell that is northern Ontario in a wet spring.  Fish were caught and fun was had by all, but my son stole the show.  Doncha think?http://vimeo.com/68929856
God they are so cute at that age and then they grow up and make fun of you. Glad you got out with him and that's a fat smallie.
Nice job!  Love those black smallies
If that doesn't put a smile on your face, you're dead.  Whatta bass for the kid!
